response.original_title: JamsCollection 7thワンマンLIVE at 日本武道館『We are JamsCollection!!!!!!!!!』
response.overview: JamsCollection, which set the goal of "standing at Japan Budokan in three years" when the group was formed, realized the dream of becoming a Japan Budokan one-man man in about three years after its formation as declared!  This performance, which is the culmination of their energetic activities and efforts without stopping their momentum, will be broadcast exclusively live on the Teletext channel!  ■JamsCollection  The new generation royal idol group "JamsCollection", commonly known as Jams, has made its major debut less than a year after its inception and has held one-man live performances on numerous big stages.  The group's name comes from the idea that "it's full of favorite songs, favorite people, cute, cool, and everyone's favorite things."  The eight members are Mizuki Tsushiro, Koon Kagura, Ayaka Ichinomiya, Rin Hoshina, Sara Minase, Shion Murazo, Ryuka Kokogi, and Yume Oba.
response.title: JamsCollection 7th One-man Live at Nippon Budokan "We are JamsCollection!!!!!!!!!"
